term.title: katal

item.text: Unit for catalytic activity coherent with the SI, equal to the catalytic activity that catalyses a reaction rate of one mole per second in an assay system. 1 kat = 1 mol s-1. The katal is recommended for use in the specific context of enzymes and clinical chemistry.
